net.pandoragames.charset

Class CP437Extra

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.nio.charset.Charset
      • net.pandoragames.charset.CP437Extra
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<java.nio.charset.Charset>

    public class CP437Extra
extends java.nio.charset.Charset
    A modified version of code page 437 (DOS) to display "unprintable" characters:
    • 0x00 (NULL) is rendered as Ø (Unicode 0x00D8).
    • 0xFF (Non breaking space) is rendered as □ (Unicode 0x25a1).
    Author:
    Olivier Wehner
